name: Diecision: A Puzzle Game
description:
A simple puzzle game where you traverse through the levels using the face of the die against the tiles to keep your health up.

Sadly there wasn't time for more level design before the jam ended.  I do plan on expanding this going forward once the voting unlocks.  Thanks for checking it out!

Controls WASD / Arrows / D-pad Move die SHIFT / Left Trigger Change Camera Credits

A game by Squabbler. 

Thanks to acarpenterrific for levels/ideas, exolent for ideas, and the BKKC Bois for support.
